subject: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError
msgSnippet: Hi, I was wondering if someone could help resolve this error.  when I run the AllTests class from the root directory I get the following error message.
messageBody:
Hi,

I was wondering if someone could help resolve this error. when I run
the AllTests class from the root directory I get the following error
message. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
AllTests (wrong name: junit/samples/AllTests). But it works find when
I give the whole path junit.samples.AllTests.

I did include the /junit/samples/ directory in the CLASSPATH.

thanks,
Thiva
